benchmark_details.name: EMOBENCH-UA
benchmark_details.overview: EMOBENCH-UA is the first manually annotated benchmark dataset for emotion detection in Ukrainian texts created through a crowdsourcing annotation pipeline.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset for emotion detection in Ukrainian texts to encourage the development of Ukrainian-specific models.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset is restricted to basic emotions and does not include nuanced or implicit emotional states.

data.annotation: Crowdsourced annotation through the Toloka.ai platform with multiple quality control measures.

methodology.calculation: F1 Score computed per emotion and overall using Precision and Recall.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 Score indicates better performance in classifying emotions correctly.
methodology.validation: The dataset was validated through majority voting from multiple annotators.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All texts were anonymized to avoid personal and sensitive information disclosure.
